H3.text: who died doing the luge in the olympics. Nodar Kumaritashvili

A4.text: Nodar Kumaritashvili was a Georgian luge athlete who suffered a fatal crash during a training run for the 2010 Winter Olympics competition in Whistler, British Columbia, Canada, on the day of the opening ceremony.

A5.text: He was the fourth athlete to die during preparations for a Winter Olympics.
